typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		movie as string,
		title as string,
		genres as string,
		year as string,
		Rating as string,
		{Rotton Tomato} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> ADLSG2ds
ADLSG2ds select(mapColumn(
		movie,
		title,
		genres,
		year,
		{Rotton Tomatoes} = {Rotton Tomato}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> CorrectColumnName
CorrectColumnName filter(toInteger(year) > 1950) ~> FilterMoviesUnder1951
FilterMoviesUnder1951 derive(PrimaryGenre = iif(locate("|",genres) > 1, left(genres, locate("|",genres)-1),genres)) ~> DerivedColumn1
